Class TypeComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.ents.AbstractComponent
      • com.almasb.ents.component.ObjectComponent<Serializable>
        • com.almasb.fxgl.entity.component.TypeComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.almasb.easyio.serialization.SerializableType, com.almasb.ents.Component, com.almasb.ents.CopyableComponent<TypeComponent>, com.almasb.ents.serialization.SerializableComponent

    public class TypeComponent
extends com.almasb.ents.component.ObjectComponent<Serializable>
implements com.almasb.ents.serialization.SerializableComponent, com.almasb.ents.CopyableComponent<TypeComponent>
    Represents an entity type.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • TypeComponent

        public TypeComponent()
        Constructs a component with no type.

      • TypeComponent

        public TypeComponent(Serializable type)
        Constructs a component with given type. Note: although the type could be any object, it is recommended that an enum is used to represent types.
        Parameters:
        type - entity type

        Returns:
